azurerm_container_registry_webhook.description: Manages an Azure Container Registry Webhook.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Container Registry Webhook. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Container Registry Webhook. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

registry_name.description: The Name of Container registry this Webhook belongs to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

service_uri.description: Specifies the service URI for the Webhook to post notifications.

actions.description: A list of actions that trigger the Webhook to post notifications. At least one action needs to be specified. Valid values are: `push`, `delete`, `quarantine`, `chart_push`, `chart_delete`

status.description: Specifies if this Webhook triggers notifications or not. Valid values: `enabled` and `disabled`. Default is `enabled`.

scope.description: Specifies the scope of repositories that can trigger an event. For example, `foo:*` means events for all tags under repository `foo`. `foo:bar` means events for 'foo:bar' only. `foo` is equivalent to `foo:latest`. Empty means all events.

custom_headers.description: Custom headers that will be added to the webhook notifications request.

id.description: The ID of the Container Registry Webhook.

create.description: Used when creating the Container Registry Webhook.

update.description: Used when updating the Container Registry Webhook.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Container Registry Webhook.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Container Registry Webhook.
